cz.cuni.mff.kocur.world

Class WorldUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.world.World
      • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.world.WorldUpdate

  • public class WorldUpdate
extends World
    Class that extends the World. It contains interests and time, the is the only difference. It is used for updates. Those are not done by World class, because there might be some data, that the world should not contain (interests, time).
    Author:
    kocur
